name: Cinderneck Stork
description: A bird with an elegant gait. Its golden-gray feathers accentuate its slender, graceful silhouette.\nDue to its elegant bearing, some creatures would deliberately provoke it just to watch its defensive warning display, which resembles a dance. Naturally, this behavior is now strictly prohibited by Tubby.\nFor some unknown reason, even after coming to The Realm Within, certain creatures have retained the unique appearances that were previously formed under the influence of kuuvahki...
